name: Michael Kosta
monologue: For days now there’s been a simmering tension between Donald Trump and Elon Musk, the leader of the free world and the breeder of the free world.

name: Michael Kosta
monologue: Oh, my God, I can’t believe it. The thing that was always going to happen is now happening. I thought these two billionaires with the world’s biggest egos would work it out amicably.
